about.details:
Incorporated in 2007, Airo Lam Limited manufactures and markets a range of hi pressure decorative laminates in India and internationally. They offers laminated sheets, pre-laminated boards, and laminated floorings under the various brands, such as Classico, Airolam, I-Lam, Airolite, Airoline, I-Lite, Premium Airodoor, Airodoor, Airo Flexi, Airo xterior, Airo Digilam, etc. Company's products mainly used in the kitchen furniture, workshops, bathroom furniture, interior doors, counter tops, and interior wall linings.

They serves homes, offices, libraries, schools, colleges, universities, hospitals, laboratories, hotels, restaurants, shopping malls, food courts, store interiors, or airports through a network of dealers. The company also exports its products to various countries including the UAE, Syria, Kuwait, Bangladesh, Dubai, Singapore, Iran, etc. At present they have around 70 distributors and 4 stock points across the country.

contactDetails.full_address: Airo Lam Ltd, Survey No. 355, Nananpur Road N.H. No.8, Village- Dalpur Tahsil-Prantij -

faqs.question: What is the Airo Lam IPO?
faqs.answer:
Airo Lam IPO is a SME IPO of 4000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹15.20 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹38 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 25, 2017, and closes on September 27, 2017.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Airo Lam IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Airo Lam IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Airo Lam IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Airo Lam IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Airo Lam IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Airo Lam IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Airo Lam IPO opens on September 25, 2017 and closes on September 27, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Airo Lam IPO?
faqs.answer: Airo Lam IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,14,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Airo Lam IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Airo Lam IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
